mapper.select: SELECT tag_id AS tagId , tag_name AS tagName , tag_color AS tagColor FROM tag WHERE tag_type = #{tagType}
SELECT id , name FROM user WHERE SUBSTR(organization_code, 1, 8) = #{orgCode}

SELECT A.name , (select value from groupware.code where code = A.grade_code) as code_nm , (select name from groupware.organization where code = #{orgCode}) as org_nm , CONCAT(A.name, ' ', (select value from groupware.code where code = A.grade_code)) AS name_grade , A.grade_code , A.organization_code , A.position_code , A.status_code , A.type_code , CONCAT('https://group.emotion.co.kr/', C.path, '/', C.name, '.', C.type) AS profile_img FROM groupware.user A INNER JOIN ( SELECT * FROM groupware.user_profile WHERE (user_id, file_id, is_delete) IN ( SELECT user_id, max(file_id) AS file_id, is_delete FROM groupware.user_profile WHERE is_delete = 0 GROUP BY user_id ) ) B ON A.id = B.user_id
INNER JOIN groupware.file C ON A.id = C.target_id AND B.file_id = C.id AND C.section = 'USER' WHERE 1 = 1 AND SUBSTR(A.organization_code, 1, 8) = #{orgCode} AND A.status_code = 'MB100001' ORDER BY A.grade_code, position_code, role_id ASC
